dmca.title: Illegal Pictures being used
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal
<http://www.theplanet.com/legal> .

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


________________________________

From: xxglamrgrlxx@aol.com [mailto:xxglamrgrlxx@aol.com] 
Posted At: Sunday, April 09, 2006 5:55 PM
Posted To: Microsoft Office Outlook Embedded Message
Conversation: Illegal Pictures being used
Subject: Illegal Pictures being used


To whom it may concern,
 
The site www.Planetbrooke.com hosted by you is selling unauthorized
pictures of me. They do not have a model release, which is against
federal law and also a requirement for hosting such pictures. We are in
the process of pursuing legal matters but I wanted to inform you so you
were not caught in any legal actions we take and also so that these
pictures will be taken down as soon as possible. I spoke with one of
your representatives, Mickey, and he assured me your help on this
matter. Thank you for your time.
 
Also, my photos are also located on other sites hosted by you,
www.asphericash.com and www.myplanetgirls.com. These sites are operated
by the same webmaster. I would appreciate their removal also. 
 
Thank you,
Elizabeth Adcock
601-720-8139
